
- [ foo ](/url)
- [foo](/url)
- [ foo](/url)
- [foo ](/url)
- [      foo     ](/url)
- Starts with `^`
    - [ ^foo ](/url)
    - [^foo](/url)
- Image link
  - [ ![x](x.png) ](/url)
  - [![x](x.png)](/url)
  - [ ![x] ](/url)
  - [![x]](/url)
- Multi lines
  - [ foo
      bar ](/url)
  - [foo
      bar](/url)
  - [
      foo
      bar
    ](/url)
  - [  
      foo
      bar  
    ](/url)
- Empty
  - [](/url)
  - [ ](/url)
  - [      ](/url)

[x]: /url
